sources.name: Original Audit Report (AV-001-20251026)
sources.description: Canonical audit documenting all 203 violations across 5 severity levels (0=FATAL, 1=Determinism, 2=Evidence, 3=Posture, 4=Errors)

sources.name: Python Codebase
sources.description: Source code being remediated. Baseline snapshot locked via git tag for emergency rollback.

sources.name: Existing Test Suite
sources.description: 523 existing tests serving as regression detection during remediation. All passing as of AR-001 completion.

sources.name: AR-001 Reference Implementation
sources.description: Working implementations of 5 authenticity gates. Used as reference for enforcing gates during remediation.

sources.name: Task Scaffolding Context
sources.description: Context files defining remediation strategy: hypothesis.md, design.md, evidence.json, data_sources.json, adr.md, assumptions.md, cp_paths.json

exclusions.name: Third-party Data Provider APIs
exclusions.reason: Already validated, not in remediation scope

exclusions.name: Infrastructure (Docker, Kubernetes)
exclusions.reason: Assumed stable, only code changes in scope

exclusions.name: Data Lake (Iceberg, DuckDB)
exclusions.reason: Schema validated in separate audit, not modified

exclusions.name: Production ESG Database
exclusions.reason: PII sensitive, using test fixtures and cached reports
